summary: Completed testing for OMNISupply.io iteration 11. All 5 language translations on the Landing Page are working correctly (English, French, German, Italian, Dutch). The Infosys BPM logo on the Login page is clearly visible with a white background. All sections are properly translated including Hero, Stats, AI Features, How It Works, Payment Options, CTA, and Footer.

English (EN) - Navigation translated: Features, How It Works, Payment Options
English (EN) - Stats translated: Annual Spend Managed, Enterprise Clients, Average Savings, Languages Supported

English (EN) - Contact Sales button translated

Dutch (NL) - Navigation translated: Functies, Hoe het Werkt, Betalingsopties

Language selector functionality working - switches all text on page
Infosys BPM logo on Login page - visible with white background (114x56 pixels)
AI Features section translated in all 5 languages
How It Works section translated in all 5 languages
Payment Options section translated in all 5 languages
CTA section translated in all 5 languages

german_translation.note: Managed Services correctly translated as 'Verwaltete Dienste'

language_selector.details: Language selector in top-right corner allows switching between all 5 languages, updates all text on page immediately

infosys_bpm_logo_login_page.details: Logo is clearly visible with white background container (bg-white rounded-2xl p-6), dimensions 114x56 pixels

critical_code_review_comments: Translation implementation uses translation keys (labelKey, titleKey, descKey) in data arrays (PLATFORM_STATS, AI_FEATURES, PROCESS_STEPS, PAYMENT_MODELS) which are resolved at render time using t.landing.* translations
All 5 languages (en, fr, de, it, nl) have complete translations in /app/frontend/src/i18n/translations.js
Language context (useLanguage hook) properly provides t, language, changeLanguage, and languageOptions
Infosys BPM logo on login page has white background with proper styling: bg-white rounded-2xl p-6 border border-white/30 inline-block shadow-lg

success_rate.frontend: 100% (all 5 language translations verified, logo visibility confirmed)

seed_data_creation: None - tested landing page translations only
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 11 fully tested. Multi-language translation feature on Landing Page is complete and working for all 5 languages (EN, FR, DE, IT, NL). All sections translate correctly: Hero, Stats, AI Features, How It Works, Payment Options, CTA, Footer. Language selector in top-right corner works properly. Infosys BPM logo on Login page is clearly visible with white background. Use demo@infosys.com/demo123/USA for testing authenticated features.
